column2: RedHill Biopharma Ltd. is an Israel-based specialty biopharmaceutical company, primarily focused on the commercialization and development of proprietary drugs for the treatment of gastrointestinal diseases. The Company promotes the gastrointestinal drug Aemcolo in the United States (U.S.). Its key clinical late-stage development programs include: RHB-104, with positive results from a first Phase 3 study for Crohn's disease; RHB-204, with a planned pivotal Phase 3 study for pulmonary nontuberculous mycobacteria (NTM) infections; RHB-102 (Bekinda), with positive results from a Phase 3 study for acute gastroenteritis and gastritis and positive results from a Phase 2 study for IBS-D; ABC294640 (Yeliva), RHB-106, and RHB-107.
